price: Au wanasema: Amekizua? Bali hichi ni Kweli iliyo toka kwa Mola wako Mlezi ili uwaonye watu wasio fikiwa na mwonyaji kabla yako; huenda wakaongoka.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: Ati wanasema: Kaizua Muhammad, naye akamsingizia Mwenyezi Mungu! Haiwafalii wao kusema hayo. Kwani hii ni Haki, Kweli, iliyo teremka kutokana na Mola wako Mlezi, ili upate kuwakhofisha kwayo watu ambao hawajapata kujiwa na Mtume kabla yako, utaraji kwa onyo hili wapate kuongoka na waifuate Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu bal huwa al-ḥaqu min rabbika litundhira qawman mā atāhum min nadhīrin min qablika laʿallahum yahtadūna
